entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:55 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:55 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
